inn1.comm: we have a first ball strike! Poor shot by Jamshed, the ball lands outside off and swings away, not sure if Jamshed wanted to leave it in the last minute, he hangs his bat out half-heartedly and tamely chips it to Mahela who cups it above his head at second slip
jags back in off the surface and clips him high on the pad, Younis walks all around it and does a dance at the crease
Appeal! Cuts back in again and clips the top flap of  his pad, the slips cordon gets excited and Dharmasena is unmoved, that wouldn't have hit
gets behind the line and some wood on it finally
unconvincing way to get off the mark, leans forward and gets a leading edge past gully and down to third man
teases him outside the off stump with one that straightens and he pokes his bat at it
137 kph, not much bounce and carry to the keeper, he watchfully lets it go
136.8 kph, lands it outside off and Younis gets slightly across and taps it to point
taps it with soft hands towards short cover and calls early for the run
lands it on a fullish length outside off, he pushes it towards cover and sets off for an easy single
stays at the crease and taps it firmly to point
holds the length back a bit and gets it to straighten outside off, he hangs his bat out and nearly gives his wicket away
another sharp Kula in-dipper, catches Kamran in two minds this time, traps his high on the pads
shows the full face of the bat and defends in front of middle stump
angles it in and he clips him down to mid-on
inswing again and he reads it well and pushes him firmly to mid-off
cuts back in sharply from outside off and Kamran stays back and gets a thick inside edge to his pads
gets beside the line and pushes it softly to point
gets across his stumps on the backfoot and defends to the off side
swings it away and he gets forward and pushes it down to cover point
overpitched and drifting in on the pads, easy going for the batsman as he forces it away wide of square leg, outfield's pretty quick
gets behind the line and defends to the off side
137.6 kph, gets nicely behind the line and defends firmly
drifts too wide of the off stump, Younis isn't going to chase that
hits a good length outside off, defended back to the bowler
silken straight drive, Kulasekara swings it on middle and leg and pitches it up, he shows the full face of the bat and a defensive push is enough to beat mid-on
Appeal: Nips back in and traps him on the pads but drifting down the leg side, close call but a good decision by Dharmasena
gets beside the line and steers it to the off side
the inswinger drifts towards the middle stumps and Kamran uses his wrists well to clip it wide of square leg, he uses the movement well
thick inside edge to his pads and Kamran is in a bit of discomfort
back of a length on middle and leg, he hops and clips it to square leg
gets behind the line and defends in front of the off stump
that's a cracker of a drive, pitched up outside off, he gets a few paces forward from the crease and crashes it past the big gap between cover and mid-off
defends firmly to the off side
gets beside the line and steers him to backward point

the openers are gone and a good catch by Samaraweera, Thushara bowls it in the channel outside off and pitches it up, Kamran shapes to drive square but gets a thick outside edge which travels low and quickly to the slips,Samaraweera falls to his left, cups it comfortably on the dive
lands it outside off, he gets beside the line and steers it to point
bowls it a touch wide outside off, reaches out and steers him to backward point
Younis plays a flashy square cut and Kapugedera does well at backward point to slide and save a few runs,
gets behind the line and taps it down to Mathews at cover
cuts back in and almost slices him in half, it clipped something, most likely the pad and Sanga appeals, Kula doesn't bother and Dharmasena smiles
nips back in sharply and he manages to defend it away safely
bowls it back of a length, stays on the backfoot and defends with a straight bat
nice stump to stump line, once again Malik is solid in defense
138.2 kph, keeps it outside off this time and holds its line before reaching the keeper

he goes for a duck, he pitches it  back of a length on middle stump and gets it to hold its line, Malik's caught at his crease on the backfoot and the ball hits him on the top flap of the pad, may be a trifle too high, I'm not terribly convinced about that, reminds me of Mitchell Johnson's wicket yesterday
angles away and Umar's beaten outside off
welcome to international cricket son, angles it on the pads, easy going for Akmal as he whips it away off his pads past midwicket
comes back in off the surface and he steers it to the off side
nudges it softly off his pads and sets off for a sharp single, the fielder at midwicket tries to under arm the ball to the stumps but he collides with Umar
sharp inswing, left alone safely to the keeper
gets nicely behind the line and defends back to the bowler
gets across his stumps to cover the movement and defends back to the bowler
sharp inward movement and he gets a thin inside edge onto his pads, Kula appeals but then realises there was an edge
beats everybody! Poor Thushara didn't deserve that, bowls it on the channel outside off, beats the uneasy prod forward and Sanga was foxed by that as well, hard luck boss
lands outside off and beats him again
gets across and gets a thick inside edge onto the pads
gets beside the line and pushes him to the covers
stays beside the line and steers him to backward point
cuts back in off the seam, gets across his stumps and defends
swings it in and he gets across and defends to the off side
action replay, if Kula bowls it there Younis will push it there
this time he angles it more towards middle and leg and Younis pushes it down the track
bang on target again, safely patted back down the pitch
angles it on the pads, he uses his wrists and clips it down to fine leg
fires it fullish in length outside off, he pushes it down to mid-off
holds the length back on middle and off, he gets beside the line and defends
gives him width outside off and he hops at the crease and slices it to backward point, Younis says "No, no,no,no,no,no"
stays behind the line and defends down the pitch
clips his pads but maybe missing leg, pitched outside leg as well, was a confident shout, that's another maiden, something's got to give here
angles it in and he firmly pushes it back to the bowler
nice shot to break the shackles, he leans forward to a pitched up delivery outside off and pushes it past the big gap between mid-off and cover
lands it on middle and leg, he tucks it to mid-on
gets right across his stumps and shoulders arms, well left in the end
excellent sliding stop by Samaraweera at short midwicket, saved a couple surely
chopped hard to the off side but he can't beat cover point
gets across his stumps and clips it to midwicket
shapes away from the right hander and Younis gets forward and tries to steer it to third man, close to that edge there!
inside edge onto the pads and he takes a quick single to the on side
he bangs it in short outside off and Umar chases it, he upper cuts it safely over Mahela's reach at first slip
lands it on a good length on middle and leg, he clips it to the on side
plays it right back to the bowler
tempts him to play a flashy drive outside off, swigs it away and pitches it up, nearly succeeds in finding an edge though
holds the length back and swings it away, has Younis at sea all over again, very scratchy
attempts a yorker but it turns into a low full toss, Younis somehow manages to push it back to the bowler, you can make out that he's not at ease
much better, pushed back to the bowler firmly

that should make Younis feel a lot better, he jabs firmly at a delivery on his pads and times it well past midwicket, the ball gathers pace near the boundary and really tests Tharanga who runs across from deep square leg
gets beside the line and steers him square on the off side
he leans forward to drive but just opens the the face of the bat and steers it wide of gully
lands it on a good length outside off and he gets beside the line and steers him wide of point
taps it to cover and tells his partner to wait
stays on the backfoot and punches him away neatly past cover point and cover, the sweeper picks it up
drifts on the body and he shuffles and clips him to fine leg
clips him to deep midwicket and it's drinks
gets forward and slices it off the front foot square of the wicket on the off side, the fielder does well at point to cut it off
another attempt at suicide outside the off stump, the ball kicks up and beats the edge
make that two in a row, he leans forward and tries to dangerously dab it to third man
three for the road, Malinga cranks up the pace and the same result, Younis escapes again
beaten again, default mode, this time the ball keeps a touch low but it still beats the forward and bounces to the keeper
he finally gets some bat on it and manages to defend to the off side
opens the face of the bat and gets an outside edge past the keeper, Murali does well at third man to cut it off
poor shot and Umar will rue that, he gets on the front foot and slashes hard at a delivery which holds its line, thick outside edge and Mathews didn't have to look back for confirmation
gets nicely behind the line and defends to the off side
lands it outside off, gets behind the line and defends
pushes it straight to the cover fielder
stays behind the line and defends
pushes him down to cover
beaten outside off again, well normal service resumes and Younis sees the lighter side of it
pitches it up and he gets forward and defends
mixes it up by bowling it short down the leg side, Younis pulls, doesn't control it very well and mistimes it to fine leg
a soft front-foot punch fetches him a sharp single to mid-off
stays behind the line to a back of a length delivery and defends to the off side
stays behind the line and defends firmly down the pitch
sharp single and Fawad makes it, he punches it past Mathews and challenges the mid-off fielder
drops it short of a length outside off, he reaches out and punches it to point
stays behind the line and punches him back to the bowler
the dream delivery! Angles inwards, draws the batsman forward and shapes away, beats him all ends up, Capt. Younis is still at sea
fullish in length outside off and he pushes it away to mid-off
drops it short outside off, he stays back and works it across the line to the on side
stays beside the line and angles it away wide of backward point
adjusts his length by bowling it fuller, Fawad uses his wrists and clips it away wide of midwicket
sharp bouncer and Fawad ducks just in time and gets his elbow out of the way, good judgement in the end
stays beside the line and angles him away to the sweeper on the off side
Close call for Fawad! He chips it in the air just wide of Samaraweera's reach at short midwicket, tough chance though
stays back and defends to the off side
punches it to the covers again, I don't think it's drizzling as yet
swings it on the pads and clips his legs, prompts a loud appeal from Mathews but it was slipping down leg and Steve Davis knew that
gets an inside edge onto his pads as he tries to work it away to the on side
pushes it to mid-off with soft hands and pinches a cheeky single, well done Fawad
lands it on a good length on middle and off, he clips it back down the pitch
grants him width and he obliges by steering him to the sweeper on the off side
too wide outside off and Younis helps himself to a thumping square drive
hits the deck hard outside off but gets exaggerated seam movement
stands way outside the leg stump and shuffles across as the bowler delivers, he pushes it back to the bowler
he tried to swat that away to the on side but changed his mind in the last second and instead pushes it back to the bowler

that extra delivery has fetched Sri Lanka a strike! Poor shot by Fawad, he tries to upper cut a short delivery and gets a thick edge to Sangakkara who takes it in front of his face, the nick was loud and clear
comes round the wicket, he follows the turn and works it to short fine leg
defends back to the bowler
gets his front pad across and clips it wide of square leg
doesn't take him too long to fine his groove! He reaches out to a wide delivery and slashes it high in the air wide of slip and down to third man, nobody patrolling that area
pushes it with the turn to long-on
slides down the leg side and Younis tries to work him away
full on the pads and pushed through the line to midwicket
fullish in length on off and middle, he squirts it away towards mid-off and turns down the single
plays a very firm square cut but finds the fielder, good looking shot though
pushed firmly through the line but he finds mid-off
punched to the covers this time
drifts on the body and he clips it wide of midwicket for a couple
gets across his stumps and defends to the off side
stays behind the line and defends
punches it firmly back to the bowler
strays on the leg side and he shuffles and clips him to short fine leg

very tame dismissal, Murali continues bowling round the wicket and pitches it up on the pads, Younis tries to work him to the on side, lunges forward and ends up chipping it loosely to Kapugedera at short midwicket, one of the easiest of catches
Razzaq gets off the mark with a backfoot punch past point
slow through the air and defended softly down the pitch
fetches it from outside off and clips him across the line to square leg
that's a gift for Pakistan, Thushara's bouncer beats everybody, forget about it
lands it on a good length outside off, he pushes it down to cover
lands it outside off, he gets beside the line and steers him to sweeper cover
slides down the leg side and and Sangakkara dives to his left and collects it well, there was a sound and it was ball brushing the pad, Thushara withdraws the appeal
wide outside off and perhaps a harsh call
lands outside off and he shoulders arms

Pakistan slip further, Murali bowls round the wicket and flights it on middle and leg, Afridi takes him on and mows him high over the on side but Jayasuriya's stationed there at deep midwicket for the catch
slow through the air and defended back to the bowler
full on the off stump and driven down to long-off
he nearly edges it to the keeper down the leg side
stays back and pushes him to the off side for a single
that's a gift, Pakistan need more of those, Murali drifts wide down the leg side and beats the keeper and leg slip, Samaraweera gives up the chase
stays back and defends back to the bowler
stays beside the line and steers him to point
stays back and defends to the off side again
lands it outside off, the ball holds its line before reaching the  keeper
keeps it on the same line outside off and he's happy to let this go as well
just a hint of extra width this time and he reaches out and steers him down to third man
drives softly to backward point and tells his partner to wait
yet another gift down the leg side but it doesn't cost SL five wides
lands it on a good length on the off stump, he pushes it to the off side
gets forward and pushes it to the on side
drifts down the leg side, Murali loses his radar now and then
clipped to the on side
turns it away with soft hands to short fine leg
much quicker and flatter, he gets nicely behind the line and defends back to the bowler
lands it on a good length outside off and he shoulders arms
holds its line before reaching the keeper
nice punch off the front foot to short cover
keeps it on a good length outside off, he gets across and thumps it to the off side
another firm punch but straight back to the bowler
fullish in length on the off stump, he pushes it to mid-off and it's drinks
drifts on the pads and he clips him down to short midwicket
pushed to square leg for a single
flatter and quicker, he shuffles and clips him behind square on the on side
drifts down the leg side and he sweeps but fails to make contact
slightly short and wide and he thumps it to the sweeper on the off side
flighted on middle and leg, defended to the on side
strange looking shot, he turns the face of the bat and chips him high in the air to the vacant spaces at mid-on
back of a length delivery on the off, Razzaq pushes it to sweeper cover
pushes it straight to cover
full on the off stump and skids through, he shows the full face and drives to mid-off
stays behind the line and pushes it back to the bowler
keeps it on a good length outside off, he shoulders arms
knocked to square leg for a single
clips it to shot fine leg but the non striker tells him to stay back
gets well forward and smothers the spin
flighted on middle and leg, he clips it away firmly to midwicket
Razzaq doesn't agree with Ramiz, he launches into full delivery and thuds it over the umpire's head for a straight boundary
shuffles and works him down to fine leg
stays back and taps it to the off side
closes the face of the bat and turns him to backward square-leg
stays back and clips him down to the on side for a single
pushes it to long-on for a single
flighted on middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
gets forward and drives to mid-on
firm drive but short cover intercepts it and saves a run or two
full on the off stump and driven down the pitch
comes over the wicket, slower through the air, he defends back to the bowler
flighted outside off, driven to the off side
stays back and punches a straighter delivery back to the bowler
goes for an extravagant sweep but the ball clips his pads and rolls away
stays back and punches it back to the bowler who fumbles on the dive
sweeps but finds short fine leg
stays back and punches him towards the covers
returns round the wicket, safely defended on the front foot

direct hit from the substitute Bandara! Razzaq opens the face of the bat and squezzes it out towards short third man and looks to pinch a quick single, there's a near collision mid-pitch, Bandara knows Gul is struggling and fires a direct hit at the striker's end, Gul's way out of his crease despite the dive and the third umpire takes a look
takes a single to point
stays back and thumps it to sweeper cover and they think of a second run
prods forward and gets a thin outside edge and it just drops short of Mahela at first slip
down the leg side, tries to sweep but misses
thumps it back to the bowler
Razzaq loses patience but it costs him his wicket, he tries to take the bowler downtown but fails to clear Thushara at long-on who falls backwards before the rope
steers him softly to the off side and there's confusion in the calling
fullish outside off and the Ajmal scoops him over cover
gets a half prod forward and defends firmly
that looked and sounded good, he makes room to a full delivery, gets forward and crashes it past cover, long-off gives up the chase
sweeps it to fine leg and Aamer wants the second run but Ajmal sends him back
gets forward and defends
tries to work it to the on side but fails to make proper contact
straightens after landing on the rough, he watchfully lets it go
gets beside the line and cuts him hard to the deep on the off side
defended to the off side
spectacular, so wide outside off that Aamer needed two bats to chase that
tries a yorker on the off stump but it's a low full toss a touch too wide
fullish in length on middle and off, he stays behind the line and defends back to the bowler
fullish in length outside off and he digs it out
another pacy yorker outside off which he chases but fails to squeeze it out
squirts out another yorker but pushes it back to the bowler
fires it on the blockhole outside off and Aamer nearly edges it to the keeper
tries to heave him away but mistimes it to fine leg, he walks the single
helps himself to a sweep and the ball rolls to fine leg
firm slog sweep and Malinga mops up at fine leg
chips down the track to heave him away but finds long-on
heaves him in the air this time and takes a couple to midwicket
gets on his knee and sweeps him to Malinga at fine leg
fires in the yorker and Ajmal digs it out
hits the deck hard and Ajmal sways away from the bouncer
the slower yorker this time and Ajmal closes the face late and clips it to square leg
that yorker was screeching towards the middle stump and Aamer managed to keep it away just in time
it's a low full toss and Aamer squirts it out to cover point
fullish and wide outside off, he reaches out and squeezes it out to sweeper cover
short fine leg is up and Thushara errs by drifting on the body, Ajmal closes the face very late and beats Malinga in that position
lands it outside off and Ajmal doesn't offer a shot
gets across his stumps and defends with a full face of the bat
hits a good length outside off and he thumps it hard down to mid-off
full and wide outside off, easy enough for Aamer to square drive it for a single
clipped away to mid-on
anything goes, third man is very square, it's a fiery low full toss outside off and he reaches out and steers it to third man
a much slower full toss which he manages to steer down to backward point
fullish outside off and squeezed away to third man

almost a beamer! Well Ajmal just didn't pick that, the ball was headed straight for the middle stump and Ajmal didn't expect that to dip, just below the waist line, Ajmal takes his eyes off the ball and steers it to third man, Malinga is apologetic
gets a thin outside edge and the ball drops short of Sanga because it was a slower ball
shapes away and just beats the outside edge
jams it back to the bowler and jogs out of the crease with the momentum, Kula takes aim but misses the stumps by a mile
stays back and punches him to the off side
makes room and thumps a yorker down to long-on
goes for a wild slog and the bat was no where near the ball
makes room and forces it down to sweeper cover
fires it on the pads and he clips it away down to long-on
makes room and scoops it over the on side this time, clear of mid-off
punches a low full toss to the packed off side field
that's another squeeze, some respite for Pakistan here, Aamer makes room and squirts out another yorker to third man who's square

an under arm flick ends the innings, Aamer drops the ball in front of him and they try to pinch a quick single, Ajmal is struggling to make his ground but Malinga was too quick for him, he under arms the ball on the dive and the third umpire takes a look at the direct hit

inn2.comm: almost an action replay of ball No. 1 last innings, fishes at a delivery moving away from him but the late movement saves him
leaves it with more authority this time, Aamer works up good pace
that was just a defensive push, ovrpitched on middle and off and he didn't have to lean too far forward to fetch that, bisects the gap between mid-off and cover
fullish in length outside off and moving away, he leaves it
keeps it on a good length outside off, he lets it go again
137 kph, very tentative leave there, gets across and withdraws his bat in the last minute
appeal for an lbw straight away, lands it on middle and off and appears to hit the pad first and then the bat, maybe too high, Steve Davis shakes his head
chips it uppishly wide of the bowler and well short of any fielder near mid-on
stays nicely behind the line and taps it to the off side
lands it on middle and leg, he defends with soft hands down the track
he takes a few paces down the track and launches him over mid-off and cover, not timed very well but the pacy outfield does the rest
nice timing, gets beside the line and squeezes it past the gap between cover point and cover
short and wide outside off and slashed away over backward point, Ajmal is square at third man and he has a bit of work to do to cut that off, which he does just in  front of the rope
clipped away close to the pads but he finds midwicket
gets across his stumps and defends to the on side
hurries onto him a bit quicker than  expected as Jayasuriya closes the face of the bat and pats it back to the bowler
going, going, almost! The bouncer of the day in well intercepted by Kamran
135 kph, pace again from Aamer, Jayasuriya keeps it away
gets across his stumps and pats it to the off side
gets across his stumps again and clips it to square leg, you can see that Jayasuriya is trying to improvise
too much width outside off and Tharanga cracks it to sweeper cover
just closes the face of the bat and clips him wide of midwicket
trademark Sanath there, short of a length and Jayasuriya gets on top of the bounce and clubs him over square leg, no green jerseys there I'm afraid
shuffles across his stumps for an extravagant pull but swishes at thin air instead
136.1 kph, drives it straight to cover
135.5 kph, seemed faster than that, this one bounces and hurries onto him, gets behind the line and defends
tries to clip it away to the on side but finds the fielder at midwicket

Aamer lands it on a good length outside off and gets it to angle inwards, Tharanga is forced onto the shot but the ball skids through and takes the thick outside edge, Jamshed takes it comfortably at first slip
beats him straightaway, holds its line before reaching the keeper
gets right across his stumps and taps it softly towards cover
hops at the crease and pushes it just wide of cover
drops it short of a length and that can be criminal if you bowl it there to Jayasuriya at that pace, he plays a short-arm pull and beats square leg
gets across his stumps and defends down the pitch
pushes a quick single to Younis at mid-off and there's a direct hit at the striker's end, well a little too late but a very good throw from the captain while still on his knees
shuffles across his stumps and turns it to square leg
full on middle and leg, gets forward and pushes it to mid-on
hurries onto him and bounces a bit more, the ball clips his pads and rolls away
Appeal: Comes back in from a good length and clips him on the knee roll, confident appeal and Dharmasena shakes his head, I think he's lucky to be there, looked fairly adjacent
shuffles and clips him to the on side for a single
punches it straight to cover
takes a couple of paces down the pitch and pushes it firmly back to the bowler
strays on the pads and he clips it away off his pads to retain the strike
angles it on middle and leg, he clips it straight to midwicket
knocks it back to Gul and strays out of his crease a bit, Gul fires it back but misses the stumps
strays on the pads and he works it away to the on side and Umar Akal does well to slide to his left and cut it off
short fine leg is up and Jayasuriya knows that, he hooks a bouncer and the top edge beats the fielder comfortably
gets across his stumps and knocks it back to the bowler
comes round the wicket this time and bowls it straight, Jayasuriya taps it back to the bowler
lands it on a good length and gets it to rise up, Jayasuriya fends it away
stays beside the line of the ball and taps it to the off side
tries to work it to the on side but the ball skids through and rolls off his pads
gets across and defends with a straight bat
gives him width to cut but he ends up chopping it towards cover point
gets across, closes the face of the bat and clips it to midwicket
Gul gets away with this, short and wide outside off, perfect for Jayasuriya to play his trademark upper cut but he misses it completely
this one swings back in and nearly slices him in half
cut away hard down to Fawad at backward point, nice timing though
this time he bisects the gap, he hops at the crease, rolls his wrists to a good length delivery and Fawad has a lot of chasing to do at deep point, the outfield is really quick
angles it on the pads and he works it to mid-on
hops at the crease and angles it away to third man where razzaq picks it up
poor shot, he chips down the track in an attempt to clear mid-on but he mistimes it and the ball dips in front of Nazir
shuffles and clips him to square leg
walks down the pitch early to unsettle the bowler but Razzaq drops it short, he clips it to the on side

sloppy communication, Jayasuriya drops it in front of short mid-off and sets off, Sangakkara is quickly off the blocks but there's sudden hesitation from Jayasuriya, he tells his partner to head back but it's too late as Younis jogs to the stumps and whips off the bails, who's fault is it? Jayasuriya thinks Sanga is to blame but it's hard to tell who made the first call. We'll find out in court
gets right behind the line and defends

game on here! jayasuriya makes room, chips down the pitch and launches him over backward point, he doesn't realise that a sweeper is in position and Umar hangs onto the catch, the ball swirls in the air but he does well to keep his composure and take the catch
swerves away sharply off the pitch but the outside edge was far away
gets across his stumps and clips him across the line to midwicket
lands it outside off and moves away, he safely shoulders arms
the dream ball, catches the batsman all at sea outside off, just shapes away sightly, Jayawardene escapes
gets right behind the line and defends
prods forward and pushes it to the off side
almost gets a leading edge back to the bowler, Razzaq keeps it on the stumps
fullish in length on middle and off, he pushes it through the line to mid-off
gets on the front foot and pushes it to the off side
keeps it on a good length outside off, he defends to the off side
defends with a straight bat
poor delivery and well put away, drops it short of a length outside off, he rolls his wrists and slashes it over cover point
shuffles, hops at the crease and clips it to the on side
lands it on a good length outside off and deviates slightly off the seam, left alone
nice line and length outside off, he goes on the backfoot and defends solidly
lands it on a good length outside off, comes back in sharply before reaching the keeper
hits the deck hard and the ball sails over his arched back
gets beside the line and steers him to backward point
defended solidly to mid-off on the front foot
angles it inwards, he stays right behind the line to defend
just closes the face of the bat and clips it to midwicket
has him poking outside the off stump, the ball straightens a bit as it beats the bat
tempts him with width outside off, he watchfully lets it go
defended solidly down the pitch and it's drinks
lands it on a good length outside off and he defends to the off side
gets across his stumps and pushes it softly to cover
gives him a bit of width outside off and he pushes it to the off side
ordinary effort in the boundary, Mahela times the cut past backward point very well and it challenges Gul at third man, he fails to time his dive properly and the ball rolls away
full outside off and driven straight to mid-off
hits the deck hard and the ball sails over his arched back, might as well make him play
he adjusts to a fuller length outside off and he's happy to let it go
solid drive by Kapugedera, this will release the pressure, leans forward to a pitched up delivery and stylishly punches him past the gap between mid-off and cover
lands it on a good length outside off, he pushes it to the off side
clips it close to his pads quite late and manages a couple to deep square leg, for a second I thought he was bowled
fires it on the blockhole outside off and the batsman digs it out
lands it on a good length outside off, he gets behind the line and steers it to the off side
shuffles and clips him down to square leg
lands it outside off and he chases it very late and and dabs it wide of slip
good length on the stumps, left alone to the keeper
short of a length and fended to the off side
lands it on middle and leg, he clips the full delivery to mid-on
holds the length back outside off and he rocks back and cuts to point
comes back in off the seam and clips his pads before rolling to the off side
bangs it short and he meets the ball in the front of his face and pulls
full on the pads and clipped away wide of midwicket
stays behind the line and defends
punches him down to mid-off and sets off quickly, Kapu wants the second run
keeps a bit low and the ball comes back in and beats the bat
this one stops on him a bit and he adjusts his shot by dropping his wrists and fending it off
pushes it to sweeper cover
short and wide and Mahela isn't afraid to slash in the air, Umar fumbles at sweeper cover but it doesn't cost extra runs
gets well forward and defends
flighted outside off, defended forward
action replay, defended on the front foot again
floated on middle and leg, he clips it to midwicket
lands it on middle and leg and he drives to long-on
pushes it to the on side for a single
slow through the air, defended with soft hands
just down the leg side and Kamran thought there was a faint edge, Davis shakes his head, maybe clipped the pads
clips it behind square on the on side
gets away with a wide down the leg side, not called by Davis
now that should have been called a wide down the leg side, the ball beats Kamran and it's two byes instead
gets well forward and defends back to the bowler
drives firmly and beats the bowler comfortably, takes a single to long-off

we might have a game on here! Not really a wicket-taking delivery, drops it short, almost a half tracker, Jayawardene pulls but finds Younis at short midwicket, he needed a lot more elevation and no wonder he was so peeved with himself
driven firmly back to the bowler
overpitched outside off and a firm on-drive is well intercepted by Gul at mid-off
bad ball and spanked, too short and drifting down leg, he swivels and pulls hard to fine leg and there's nobody patrolling that area
flighted on middle and leg, pushes it to mid-on
nudges it away to midwicket
gets forward and drives to cover
confusion in the running, he opens the face of the bat and steers it to gully, Kapugedera wants the second run and he's off the blocks but the throw's to the wrong end
taps it with soft hands in front of cover and sets off
defends to the off side
driven to cover, Kamran gets a little excited behind the stumps
attempts a cheeky dab to third man but he misses it completely
full outside off and driven to the off side
driven firmly again but I think the fielder at cover got a bad bounce, the misfield costs a couple
chips down the track and worked to the off side
chipped in the air towards square leg
defended back to the bowler
overpitched outside off and the batsman gets to the pitch of the ball and puts a lot of power behind the drive past the covers, the sweeper had no chance
just drifts down the leg side, may have clipped something
driven past the bowler
pushed with soft hands in front of cover and another easy single
the leg break doesn't turn, he stays back and defends
strays on the pads and he nudges it to the on side
full outside off and driven past the infield at cover
gets forward and defends with a dead bat
quicker through the air and defended with ease on the front foot
gets forward and smothers the spin
flatter and quicker, he gets forward and nudges him to the on side
gets forward and steers it to the off side
driven to the on side and the fielder from midwicket dives and cuts it off
gets forward and defends to the off side
defended with a dead bat again, he'll take his time
reaches out and dabs it to gully
poor delivery, wide outside off, he reaches out and cuts firmly down to third man
gets forward and takes a single to cover
defends forward and gets an inside edge onto his pads
another poor delivery and spanked away, drops it short, Kapugedera swivels and clubs him over midwicket
pushed softly back to the bowler
drops it short and the ball doesn't quite come onto the bat, he punches it down to mid-off
keeps it on a good length outside off and he shoulders arms
in the length to punch it away again but he ends up placing it straight to short cover
comes in with the angle and he defends it away
shapes to drive straight but gets an inside edge to the on side
quick through the air and defended on the front foot
slower through the air and defended with a dead bat
driven firmly but well intercepted at cover
driven firmly to Fawad at cover, he's been kept busy there
and once again placed to the covers
he drops it short again and pays the penalty, Kapugedera quickly rocks back, swivels and clubs him over deep midwicket, the umpire confirms it it went all the way
shuffles and works it with the turn to short fine leg
shuffles and works it with the turn to short fine leg off his pads
slow off the air, he has enough time to shuffle and clip it with the turn to fine leg
gets forward and smothers the spin
shuffles and works it away to fine leg
steers it towards point and sets off for a run but changes his mind
gets forward and defends to the off side
extra bounce, gets a little high on him and he steers it comfortably to third man
moves across his stumps and times the cut really well, beats backward point and Ajmal mops up from third man
the ball stops on him and he mistimes the punch to cover
lands it on a good length and the ball straightens, he slashes and misses
down the leg side and that's a wide
turned away with the spin to the midwicket region, easy single added to the total
Samaraweera too waits for the ball to turn and tucks it away to fine leg for a single
bit of turn and Kapugedera fails to make contact and the ball rolls away of the pad
comes down the track and turns it away through midwicket, they are making it look easy
defended down on the leg side, watchfully played
bit wide outside the off stump and Samaraweera taps it away towards point, no room for a single there

appeal for lbw turned down. Was a good length delivery and angling in from wide outside the off stump, Kapugedera looks to work it away on the leg side but fails to make contact and the ball hits him on the pad, was probably hit outside the line of the off stump
swing and a miss outside the off stump
good length delivery outside the off stump and Kapugedera drives it away towards cover
lightly short and wide outside the off stump, Kapugedera stands tall on the back-foot and punches it away through covers
good length delivery outside the off stump, Samaraweera gets well forward and defends it back to the bowler, presented the full face of the bat there
driven off the back-foot and the ball finds the fielder at point
worked away with the spin to deep midwicket - 50 partnership comes up
defended stretching well forward and the ball rolls back to the bowler
full and drifting down the leg side, Samaraweera looks to defend it down on the leg side but end up with an outside edge and the ball rolls away towards point
played away towards point, not a convincing shot
turned away well in front of square leg
drifting down the leg side and the ball rolls away off the pad
lands it on a good length outside off, he steers him to sweeper cover
lands it outside off and he punches it to mid-off but mistimes the shot
lands it outside off, he gets back and across and punches him to sweeper cover
pushes it to Fawad at point and thinks of a single but Fawad is sharp
this one really slices him in half, jags back in and well, that misses everything
a thick inside edge just sneaks past the stumps and runs down to fine leg, Pakistan will need better luck
comes round the wicket, lands it full on middle and off and he pushes it through the line to long-off
works it with the turn to deep square leg
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
beats him! The doosra foxes him and sneaks past the outside edge
closes the face and turns it to midwicket
gets forward and steers it towards cover
lands it on a good length and he gets across and clips it to midwicket for a single
gets it to nip back in around the off stump and he gets enough bat on it to steer it to the off side
Appeal He tries to hook a short delivery and both the bowler and keeper reckon it hit something, Dharmasena shakes his head and he might be correct after all
gets to his fifty with a boundary, he chases a half volley outside off and plays a neat square drive, bisects the gap between cover and point, well done
tries to drive but he's beaten
angles on the pads and he clips it to mid-on
lands it on a good length outside off and he watches it through to the keeper
gives him width outside off and he reaches out and comfortably dabs it to third man
keeps it a bit short and the ball comes on a little slow, allows him to pinch a single to cover
tries to work it to the on side but the ball hurries onto him, he pushes it down the track
shuffles across his stumps and he clips it off his pads down to fine leg, Aamer appeals but Davis shakes his head
gets steep bounce and Samaraweera attempts an upper cut, rehearses the shot
keeps a bit low and he opens the face and dabs it to short third man
punches it to point and Malik's throw to the bowler's end is way off target, must've been looking at another set of stumps
shuffles and clips it to square leg
pushed away to the off side for a single
fires it flatter and quicker and Kapu doesn't go for the pull, he instead steers it to the off side
good shot, he drops it a fraction short and the batsman gives himself enough space to cut that past cover point, sweeper had no chance
pushes a single to the covers
false shot, it's short and wide outside off and he decides at the last minute to chase it
pushes it wide of cover but the throw is wide and that allows a single, Pakistan won't be happy with that
tempts him to slash at another rising delivery and he nearly edges it this time
gets forward and steers it to short cover and that's another easy single
hits the deck hard again but he doesn't offer a shot
stays back and clips him to deep square leg, Kapugedera wants the second
gets on his knee and mows him away to deep square leg, another single
gives him width and he tries to dab that away but finds short third man
lands on middle and leg, clips it to midwicket
defends it to the off side
works it down to mid-on
lunges forward and steers him down to point, they think of a single
gets beside the line and steers him wide of backward point, Sri lanka can win this in their sleep here
stays back and punches him off the backfoot
the first overstep, but it was a good delivery, steep bounce and forces him to sway backwards
Free Hit And it's another no-ball, strays down the leg side and he pulls it away to fine leg
Free Hit  Game over, he clears the back leg, makes room and scoops a full delivery powerfully over the bowler's head
